My name is Michael Cramm. I am a software developer living in Calgary, AB. This is a landing page I built for anyone trying to contact me.

I ♡ Ruby, but also have significant experience with other languages. When I'm not coding, then I'm out trying to find coffee so I can get back to work.

This is the 3rd iteration of my landing page. It is written using Jekyll and is hosted on Heroku.
